name: @woke/contracts-src
description: Solidity source code and development tools
author: Jackson Virgo

scripts.ganache:dev: ganache-cli -i 12 -a 100 -p 8545 --gasLimit 8000000 --gasPrice 20000000000 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:test: ganache-cli -i 10 -a 300 -p 9545 --gasLimit 8000000 --gasPrice 20000000000 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:client: ganache-cli -i 12 -h 0.0.0.0 -p 8545 --gasLimit 8000000 --gasPrice 20000000000 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:goerli: ganache-cli -i 12 -p 8545 --gasLimit 8000000 --gasPrice  20000000000 --blockTime 15 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:slow: ganache-cli -i 12 -p 8545 --gasLimit 8000000 --gasPrice  20000000000 --blockTime 5 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:lan: ganache-cli -h 0.0.0.0 -i 12 -p 8545 --gasLimit 8000000 --gasPrice 20000000000 --blockTime 1 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:block: sudo /sbin/iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --destination-port 8545 -j DROP && sudo iptables-save 1>/dev/null
scripts.ganache:allow: sudo /sbin/iptables -D INPUT -p tcp --destination-port 8545 -j DROP && sudo iptables-save 1>/dev/null
